event_summary: Adventure tourism summit showcasing extreme sports, eco-tourism, and indigenous cultural experiences across New Zealand.
commentary_summary: Tourism professionals highlighted the perfect balance of adventure activities with environmental conservation and cultural respect.
next_event_plan: Develop sustainable adventure tourism certification and create indigenous-led tour operator network
